SEARCH
Package io.gitlab.chaver.mining.patterns.util

Class RSparseBitSet

java.lang.Object
io.gitlab.chaver.mining.patterns.util.RSparseBitSet
public class RSparseBitSet extends Object
Reversible bitset : for more information, see the following papers : Compact-Table: Efficiently Filtering Table Constraints with Reversible Sparse Bit-Sets (Demeulenaere et al.)

    • RSparseBitSet

      public RSparseBitSet(Model model, int nbits)
      Instanciate a RSparseBitSet with nbits set to 1
      Parameters:
      model - model used to create backtracking variables
      nbits - fixed number of bits to set to 1

    • RSparseBitSet

      public RSparseBitSet(Model model, long[] words)
      Instantiate a RSparseBitSet with words
      Parameters:
      model - model used to create backtracking variables
      words - words to create the bitset
